#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int D[] = {0,1,4,3,8,5,2,7,6,9};

int d(long int n) {
	int s = 0;
	while(n) {
		s += D[n%10];
		n /= 10;
	}
	return s%10;
}

int extra_d(long int a, long int b) {
	int s=0;
	for(long int i=a; i<=b; ++i) 
		s += d(i);
	return s;
}

int main() {
	int T, l;
	long int A, B, ans;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--) {
		cin>>A>>B;
		ans =	d(A) + 	45*((B/10)-(A/10)) + extra_d((B/10)*10, B) - extra_d((A/10)*10, A);	
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
}
